name: KFZ
description:
KFZ is a Zombie wave based shooter featuring 9 levels and plenty of Gore
Everything From Small to Large Maps

Survive 9 levels of endless zombie waves
Countless different types of weapons everything from small guns to large semi-automatic machine guns
Also laser guns, ray guns, glamor guns everything to survive do you have it in you....

With this purchase of KFZ includes nine levels several different gun types and
Endless fun for everyone
